document.full_text: the most impressive player of the nba playoffs comes up against the most scrutinized trio in professional basketball when dirk nowitzki and the dallas mavericks take on the miami heat in the nba finals starting tuesday.
document.title: miami and dallas promise a classic nba final
lines_and_colors: the most impressive player of the nba playoffs comes up against the most scrutinized trio in professional basketball when dirk nowitzki and the dallas mavericks take on the miami heat in the nba finals starting tuesday.
